post.title: 50pz250 where is white color?
post.content: i had 42lg5000 for 3 years. yesterday i bought 50pz250 and it's not so bright like 42lg5000 maybe 1/3 42lg5000 of brightness. i tryed picture settings... set to bright ... and it's not so bright like i want. how can i downgrade firmware to 03.13.33 from 03.42.13.11, may by problem is in firmware. the default firmware when i bought were 03.42.13.11...
